dct_title_s: De Ghelegentheyt ende Belegheringhe van Schencken-Schans
dct_description_sm: Curyeus gemeeten ende geteeckent by den ervaren Ingenieur Ioannes Iacobi Schort.
2 bar scales on map, given in "Pieds", and "Rynlandtsche Roeden"/"Verges de Rinlande".
Publisher surmised from initials on bottom of map: IB excudebat
Shows 1635-1636 seige and fortifications of Schenkenschans.
Latin imprint at bottom of map: IB excudebat.
From Blaeu's Novum ac magnum theatrum urbium Belgicae liberae ac foederatae, 1649.
